data.comment: The match has started.
Throw-in for Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 2, Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Orlando.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 4, Jhegson Mendez for Orlando gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Atlanta at Exploria Stadium.
Free kick Atlanta.
In the minute 6, Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ball safe as Atlanta is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 8, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Atlanta close to the penalty box.
In Orlando Atlanta drive forward through Ezequiel Barco. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Corner awarded to Atlanta.
In the minute 10, Victor Rivas signals a throw-in for Atlanta, close to Orlando's area.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Atlanta just outside Orlando's area.
Atlanta drives forward and Ezequiel Barco gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 11, Victor Rivas signals a Orlando throw-in in Atlanta's half.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Victor Rivas awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 13, Orlando are pushing forward but Ruan's finish is wide of the goal.
Atlanta have a goal kick.
Throw-in Atlanta.
In the minute 15, Free kick for Orlando in the half of Atlanta.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlanta goal kick.
Chris Mueller gets his shot on target but fails to score for Orlando.
In the minute 17, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Throw-in high up the field for Orlando in Orlando.
Throw-in for Atlanta at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 19, Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Atlanta are coming forward and Anton Walkes gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 22, Victor Rivas awards Orlando a goal kick.
Orlando push forward at Exploria Stadium and Chris Mueller gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atlanta defence.
Attention is being given to Orlando’s Mauricio Pereyra and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 26, Can Atlanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
Orlando’s Mauricio Pereyra is on his feet again at Exploria Stadium.
Throw-in for Orlando in the half of Atlanta.
In the minute 27, Erick Torres of Atlanta smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in Orlando.
Atlanta awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 29, Orlando's Jhegson Mendez misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Orlando.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In Orlando Orlando's Daryl Dike is caught offside.
Throw-in for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 34, Orlando's Jhegson Mendez is on target but unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Orlando.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
In the minute 37, Benji Michel of Orlando gets in a strike, but is off target.
Victor Rivas awards Atlanta a goal kick.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Orlando in their own half.
Orlando are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 39, Franco Escobar for Atlanta has been booked by Victor Rivas and receives a first yellow card.
Antonio Carlos (Orlando) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Atlanta at Exploria Stadium.
Throw-in for Atlanta in their own half.
Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Orlando.
In the minute 41, Erick Torres (Atlanta) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Daryl Dike (Orlando) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 44, Atlanta have a goal kick.
Victor Rivas blows against Orlando's Chris Mueller for offside.
Atlanta to take a throw-in in Orlando territory.
In the minute 45, Victor Rivas will wait an extra 3 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
Orlando have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
Atlanta drive upfield and Erick Torres gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Orlando defender.
The first-half has come to a close in Orlando.
Orlando take a 1-0 lead thanks to Benji Michel.
In the minute 45, Daryl Dike with an assist there.
In the minute 46, The second-half has started.
Erick Torres (Atlanta) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
In the minute 47, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Atlanta.
Atlanta pushes forward through Emerson Hyndman, whose finish on goal is saved.
Orlando needs to be cautious. Atlanta have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 48, Victor Rivas awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Atlanta in their own half.
Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 55, Victor Rivas awards the home team a throw-in.
Jurgen Damm is replacing Miles Robinson for the away team.
Free kick Atlanta.
In the minute 57, Throw-in Orlando.
The home team replace Daryl Dike with Andres Perea.
Orlando awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 58, Jhegson Mendez for the home team is judged to be offside.
Orlando awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 60, Victor Rivas awards Atlanta a goal kick.
Can Atlanta get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Orlando's half?
Orlando have a goal kick.
In the minute 62, Free kick for Atlanta in the half of Orlando.
Atlanta's Ezequiel Barco gets in a shot on goal at Exploria Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Orlando is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 64, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
Jhegson Mendez (Orlando) gets a yellow card.
Atlanta have been awarded a corner by Victor Rivas.
In the minute 68, Ball goes out of play for a Orlando goal kick.
Orlando's Benji Michel is whistled for offside at Exploria Stadium.
Free kick for Orlando in their own half.
In the minute 70, At Exploria Stadium, Jeff Larentowicz has been yellow-carded for the away team.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Jhegson Mendez.
Atlanta make their second substitution with Adam Jahn replacing Erick Torres.
In the minute 72, Stephen Glass (Atlanta) is making a third substitution, with Matheus Rossetto replacing Ezequiel Barco.
Nani is on a sub for Mauricio Pereyra for Orlando.
The home team have replaced Benji Michel with Tesho Akindele. This is the third substitution made today by Oscar Pareja.
Victor Rivas signals a Orlando throw-in in Atlanta's half.
In the minute 73, Jhegson Mendez (Orlando) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Junior Urso.
Atlanta's Eric Remedi gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Orlando defender.
In the minute 75, Andres Perea is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Andres Perea is back on his feet again.
Can Orlando capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 79, Brooks Lennon (Atlanta) has received a yellow card from Victor Rivas.
Nani (Orlando) gets in a great strike – straight into the post! Ohhhh so close!
Adam Jahn (Atlanta) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 82, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Orlando to take a throw-in in Atlanta territory.
Kyle Smith is replacing Chris Mueller for Orlando at Exploria Stadium.
In the minute 84, Jon Gallagher is replacing George Bello for the away team.
In Orlando a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Stephen Glass is making the team's fifth substitution at Exploria Stadium with Jake Mulraney replacing Eric Remedi.
In the minute 87, Victor Rivas signals a free kick to Atlanta in their own half.
At Exploria Stadium, Atlanta are penalized for being offside.
Corner awarded to Atlanta.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Orlando.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Orlando.
Can Orlando capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atlanta's half?
Throw-in for Atlanta at Exploria Stadium.
Orlando are coming forward and Ruan gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Atlanta at Exploria Stadium.
Throw-in for Atlanta in the half of Orlando.
Full-time! The final score is 1-1.
Adam Jahn (Atlanta) nets with a header to make it 1-1 at Exploria Stadium.
Great play from Jake Mulraney to set up the goal.
